title: San Antonio Family Integrative Health - San Antonio Family Integrative Health
description: San Antonio Family Integrative Health; Professional, Practical, Effective Healthcare. We offer Chiropractic Mipulative Therapy, Functional Medicine, Acupuncture, NET.
cleaned_text: We offer wellness-based Functional Medicine, Integrative Healthcare, Advanced Clinical Nutrition & Dietary Counseling, Non-surgical Spinal Decompression, In-Home Activator Chiropractic Technique, and In-Home Medical Massage Therapy. My mission is to provide you and your loved ones a unique, personalized, open-minded, and evidence-based approach to your healing and wellness. My goal is to offer my patients a host of alternative options outside the conventional medical model, based on the science of physiology...what *your* body actually needs in order to flourish and thrive. I employ current, cutting-edge research into my examinations, analysis, assessments, and care plans. I strive to give my patients the best information, advice, and care available. I look forward to helping you.
